resources.string: \t \t TMART is an online Indian supermarket service operating in Mumbai. We offer wide range of products for all your everyday needs..

\t \t Along with wide range of products to offer at our stores for you to buy needy things from a channel convenient to you. Choose from fresh produce to packaged goods, buy products online and get them delivered straight to your doorstep, thus making it a convenient and quick process. We are sure to have all the products for your daily dietary needs from regular local Indian brands and products to exotic and international imported ones. You can pay for shopping using credit cards or cash.
Instant Delivery is provided. Ordered Products will be delivered within 1 hour , 2 hour or anytime of the day based on your requirements
TMART offers you wide range of categories. You can search your products category-wise and add to your cart.
TMART offers you discount on each product. Small bugdet big offers is our motive.
Pay as per convinience. You can pay using credit cards via paypal or cash. Online payment is secure and safe.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
